text.value: Ward (After ward write in brackets Attended/Not Attended training)
1.1 Name of CHW (After CHW name write in brackets Months as CHW and Months in workstation, eg 12-CHW and 5-workstation)
2.1. Have you heard of a disease called brucellosis?
If no to Q 2.1; end the questionnaire and move on to next eligible person
2.2. Where did you get informed about brucellosis?
Other ways you got informed about brucellosis
3. Brucellosis transmission: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements
3.1. Brucellosis affects domestic ruminants (cattle, sheep, goats)
3.3. Brucellosis can be transmitted from cattle to humans
3.4. Brucellosis can be transmitted from sheep/goats to humans
3.5. A person could acquire brucellosis by drinking raw/un-pastoralized milk
3.6. A person could acquire brucellosis by eating raw cheese
3.7. A person could acquire brucellosis by contact with aborted foetuses or placenta
3. Brucellosis transmission: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements
3.8. A person could acquire brucellosis by eating meat, liver or spleen not well cooked
3.9. Sexual transmission of brucellosis can occur in humans
3.10. A person can acquire brucellosis by inhaling aerosolized bacteria
3.11. A person can acquire brucellosis through breaks in the skin or mucous membranes
3.12. A person can acquire brucellosis through blood transfusion from infected person
3.13. A person can acquire brucellosis through transplacental transfer from infected person
3.14. A person can acquire brucellosis through contact with menstrual blood from infected person

4. Clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis in human: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. The common clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis include
4. Clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. The common clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis include

5. Clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis in animals: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. The common clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis include
5.2. still birth or birth of weak offspring

5. Clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis in animals: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. The common clinical signs and symptoms of brucellosis include
6.1. Do you advise/refer patients to visit health facilities when they experience clinical manifestations suggestive of brucellosis?
6.2. How do you provide referral to health facility?
6.3. Do you advise farmers to consult veterinary officers when their animals experience clinical manifestations suggestive of brucellosis?
6.4. Do you keep records of suspected brucellosis cases in animals?
6.5. Do you keep records of suspected brucellosis cases in human?
6.7. How many cases of of brucellosis have you ever suspected in humans in your area during the past 12 months?
6.8. How many cases of of brucellosis have you ever suspected in cattle in your area during the past 12 months?
6.9. How many cases of of brucellosis have you ever suspected in sheep in your area during the past 12 months?
6.10. How many cases of of brucellosis have you ever suspected in goats in your area during the past 12 months?
6.11 How frequently do you submit reports for human cases to higher levels
How frequently do you submit reports for human cases to higher levels (Others)
6.12 How frequently do you submit reports for animal cases to higher levels
How frequently do you submit reports for animal cases to higher levels (Others)
6.13. How do you submit reports to higher levels?
Other mechanism of submitting reports to higher level
6.14. How long it usually takes to receive feedback from higher level?
6.15. How do you receive feedback from higher level?
6.16. How do you communicate feedback to patients/community members?
6.17. Have you received training on the detection, recording and reporting of diseases transmissible between animals and humans?
6.18. Do you have guidelines or reference materials for detection, recording and submission of clinical manifestations suggestive of brucellosis?
6.19. If yes to last Qn; ask to see guidelines/reference materials: Seen:
7. Prevention and control: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements. Brucellosis can be prevented by:
7.2. Eating meat, liver or spleen well cooked
7.3. Control of brucellosis in human depends much on control of the disease in animals
7.5. Wearing gloves when handling aborted foetuses or placenta
7.6. Washing hands after close contact with animals and/or their products
8. Attitude: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements.
8.1. Brucellosis is an important public health disease in Tanzania
8.2. Brucellosis affects mostly the pastoral communities
8.4. Inadequate knowledge and awareness of brucellosis amongst the CHWs contribute to delayed detection and reporting of the disease
8.5. Brucellosis can be prevented and controlled through collaborative strategy between animal and human health sectors
8. Attitude: On the scale shown, how much do you agree or disagree with the following statements.
8.6. Use of guidelines or reference materials can enhance appropriate diagnosis and management of brucellosis
8.7. Engagement of community health workers in event-based surveillance can enhance early detection and reporting of brucellosis suspected cases
8.8. Public awareness is important for disease prevention and control
8.9. Use of mobile-phone-based technology can enhance early detection and communication of test results compared with paper-based system
9. What other diseases transmissible between animals and humans are you aware of?
Anthrax: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months
Anthrax: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months
Bovine TB: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
Rift Valley fever: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
9. What other diseases transmissible between animals and humans are you aware of?
Rabies: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
Trypanosomiasis: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
Echinococcosis: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
9. What other diseases transmissible between animals and humans are you aware of?
Ebola: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
Cryptosporidiosis: Ever suspected in your area during the past 12 months:
Are there other additional diseases transmissible between animals and humans are you aware of?
other diseases transmissible between animals and humans are you aware of

10. Challenges and recommendations: What are the challenges the CHWs face in the detection, recording, reporting and feedback regarding brucellosis (allow spontaneous response from participant before prompting)
Inadequate awareness and skills amongst the CHWs
Unspecific nature of clinical signs and symptoms of the disease
Late presentation of the cases to health facility
12.1 What type of mobile phone do you own?
Smart phone (check for functionalities such as, internet, emails, browsing, apps like whatsapp)
12.2 If participant owns smart phone: What type of OS does it have
12.3 How do you describe the strength of internet in your area
Mshiriki lazima awe na umri wa miaka 18 au zaidi
Sikumaliza elimu ya shule ya msingi
2. UELEWA WA JUMLA JUU YA BRUSELA
Kama hapana kwa swali 3.1; sitisha mahojiano na endelea na mshiriki mwingine
2. UELEWA WA JUMLA JUU YA BRUSELA
2.2. Je, ulipata wapi taarifa zinazohusiana na brusela?
Maeneo mengine ulio pata taarifa zinazohusiana na brusela?
3. Maambukizi ya brusela: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo:
3.1. Brusela inadhuru ng’ombe, mbuzi na kondoo
3.3. Brusela inaweza kuambukizwa kutoka kwa ng’ombe kwenda kwa binadamu
3.4. Brusela inaweza kuambukizwa kutoka kwa mbuzi/kondoo kwenda kwa binadamu
3.5. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kunywa maziwa yasiyochemshwa
3.6. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kula jibini (cheese)
3.7. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kugusa mimba iliyotoka kwa mnyama ama kondo la nyuma la mnyama mwenye maambukizi
3. Maambukizi ya brusela: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo:
3.8. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kula nyama ama kongosho lisilopikwa vizuri
3.9. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa njia ya ngono
3.10 Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kwa kuvuta hewa yenye vimelea vya ugonjwa
3.11. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kupitia mipasuko katika ngozi
3.12 Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kuwekewa damu isiyo salama
3.13. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kupandikizwa kiumbe katika mfumo wa uzazi kutoka kwa mtu mwenye maambukizi
3.14. Binadamu anaweza kupata maambukizi ya brusela kwa kugusa damu ya hedhi ya mtu aliye na maambukizi
4. Dalili za brusela kwa binadamu: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
4.1. Kuwa na homa zisizokoma ama za kujirudia
4. Dalili za brusela kwa binadamu: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
5. Dalili za brusela kwa wanyama: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
5. Dalili za brusela kwa wanyama: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
5.7. Kuongezeka vifo hasa kwa wanyama wadogo
6.1. Je, huwa unawashauri wagonjwa kuhudhuria sehemu za kutolea huduma za afya pindi wanapokuwa na dalili zinazoashiria brusela?
6.2. Je, huwa unawapatiaje wagonjwa rufaa ya kwenda sehemu za kutolea huduma za afya?
6.3. Je, huwa unawashauri wafugaji kuwasiliana na wataalamu wa mifugo wanyama wao wanapokuwa na dalili zinazohusiana na brusela
6.4. Je, huwa unahifadhi taarifa zinazohusiana na brusela kwa wanyama katika eneo lako?
6.5. Je, huwa unahifadhi taarifa zinazohusiana na brusela kwa binadamu katika eneo lako?
6.7 Unaweza kukisia idadi ya binadamu waliohisiwa kuwa na brusela kwa kipindi cha miezi 12 iliyopita?
6.11. Je, ni kwa kiasi gani huwa unatuma taarifa ngazi ya juu kuhusu tetesi ya brusela kwa binadamu?
Utambuzi na utoajiJe, ni kwa kiasi gani huwa unatuma taarifa ngazi ya juu kuhusu tetesi ya brusela kwa binadamu?taarifa
6.12. Je, ni kwa kiasi gani huwa unatuma taarifa ngazi ya juu kuhusu tetesi ya brusela kwa wanyama?
Utambuzi na utoajiJe, ni kwa kiasi gani huwa unatuma taarifa ngazi ya juu kuhusu tetesi ya brusela kwa wanyama?taarifa
6.14. Je, huwa unatumaje taarifa kwenda ngazi ya juu?
Njia zingine za utumaji taarifa ngazi za juu
6.14. Je, huwa inachukua muda gani kupata mrejesho kutoka ngazi ya juu?
6.18. Je, huwa unapataje merejesho kutoka ngazi ya juu
6.26. Je, huwa unawasilisha vipi mrejesho kwa jamii?
6.17 Je, umepata mafunzo juu ya kutambua, kuhifadhi na kutuma taarifa za magonjwa yaambukizwayo kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
6.18. Je, unayo miongozo ama maelezo yaliyo katika maandishi kwa ajili ya kutambua, kuhifadhi na kutuma taarifa za dalili zinazohusiana na brusela?
6.19 Kama jibu ni ndiyo kwa swali lilopita; uliza ukona miongozo ama maelezo ya maandishi: Umeona:
7. Kudhibiti na kuzuia: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo. Brusela inaweza kuzuiliwa kwa:
7.3. Udhibiti wa brusela kwa binadamu unategemea sana udhibiti wake kwa wanyama
7.5. Kuvaa mipira-kinga wakati wa kusaidia Wanyama kuzaa
7.6. Kunawa mikono baada ya kushika nyama ama mnyama
7.7. Utupaji ulio sahihi wa uchafu unaoweza kuwa na maambukizi
8. Mtazamo: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
8.2. Brusela inadhuru Zaidi jamii za wafugaji
8.4. Kutokuwepo kwa uelewa na ufahamu mzuri kwa wahudumu wa afya katika ngazi ya jamii kunachangia ufanisi hafifu wa utoaji taarifa juu ya uwepo wa brusela ama viashria vya ugonjwa
8.5. Brusela inaweza kudhibitiwa kwa ushirikiano wa sekta za afya ya binadamu na wanyama
8. Mtazamo: Katika mlinganisho uliooneshwa hapa chini, ni kwa namna gani unakubaliana ama kutokukubaliana na maelezo yafuatayo
8.6. Matumizi ya miongozo sahihi yanaweza kuboresha uchunguzi na matibabu ya brusela
8.7. Kuhusisha jamii katika ufuatiliaji wa matukio ya afya ngazi ya jamii kunaweza kuboresha utambuzi wa brusela kwa haraka
8.8. Uelemishaji juu ya brusela ni muhimu katika kuchunguza na kudhibiti ugonjwa
8.9. Matumizi ya nyenzo za kidijitali yanaweza kuboresha ufuatiliaji na utoaji taarifa za brusela Zaidi ya mfumo wa makaratasi
9. Je, ni magonjwa yapi mengine unayoyafahamu yanayoambukiza kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
Kimeta: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
Kimeta: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
Kifua Kikuu: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
9.4. Homa ya Bonde la Ufa: Ufahamu
Homa bonde la ufa: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
9. Je, ni magonjwa yapi mengine unayoyafahamu yanayoambukiza kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
Kichaa cha mbwa: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
Malale: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
Ekonokokosisi: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
9. Je, ni magonjwa yapi mengine unayoyafahamu yanayoambukiza kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
Ebola: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
Criptosporidiosisi: Je, umewahi kuhisi kutokea kwake ndani ya miezi 12 iliyopita katika eneo lako:
Je, kuna magonjwa mengine unayoyafahamu yanayoambukiza kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
magonjwa mengine unayoyafahamu yanayoambukiza kati ya wanyama na binadamu?
10. Changamoto: Je, ni changamoto zipi wahudumu wa afya katika ngazi ya jamii wanakutana nazo katika ufuatiliaji na utoaji taarifa za brusela (mruhusu mshiriki ataje kwanza kabla ya kumdodosa)
Uelewa na ufahamu duni kwa CHWs
Kutokuwepo fomu maalumu za kujaza taarifa
Wagonjwa kufika sehemu ya kupata huduma ya afya kwa kuchelewa
Ushirikiano hafifu baina ya sekta husika
Matumizi ya mfumo wa karatasi kuchukua, kuhifadhi na kutuma taarifa
12.2. Kama anatumia simu janja, ni aina gani ya OS inatumia?
12.3 Je unaweza elezeaje uwezo wa intaneti katika eneo lako
